data.title: Recipe Documentation - Potion Brewing Container Recipe

data: Recipe Documentation - Potion Brewing Container Recipe
Represents a Potion Brewing Container Recipe.

data.Name: input
data.Description: Input potion used in the brewing container recipe.

data.Name: output
data.Description: Output potion from the brewing container recipe.

data.Name: reagent
data.Description: Item used in the brewing container recipe with the input potion.

data.Name: tags
data.Description: Item that can create the Brewing Container Recipe, such as "brewing_stand".
